tool.name: GenerateRangeMap

param.name: species
param.dialogReference: Name of the primary species for the range map (see BIOTICS_ELEMENT_NATIONAL table for valid values)

param.name: secondary_species
param.dialogReference: One or more additional species to be included in the range map (see BIOTICS_ELEMENT_NATIONAL table for valid values)

param.name: range_version
param.dialogReference: A label for the version of the range map, to allow multiple versions/stages to be created over time (note that fields IncludeInEBARReviewer and Publish determines which range maps are available in the EBAR Reviewer web app)

param.name: range_stage
param.dialogReference: A label for the stage within version of the range map, to allow multiple versions/stages to be create over time

param.name: scope
param.dialogReference: The geographic coverage of the range map (Canadian = N, Global = G, North American = A); if Canadian is selected, only those Ecoshapes in Canada are included in the output

param.name: jurisdictions_covered
param.dialogReference: One or more jurisdictions indicating the extent of range map; if not provided, all jurisdictions are used for the extent

tool.summary: Generate Range Map for a species from available spatial data
